name: Super Santa Adventures 2 - RPG
description:
You are Santa and you cannot give gifts to children because your reindeer has lost a member. Your mission is to rescue your reindeer captured by monsters.
------------------
How to play: Left Ctrl or Right Ctrl for Attack - Left Shift or Right Shift for bomb.
WASD or enable touch control for moving.
Space bar for jump.
-------------
- Upgrade system
- Level system
- Shop system
